name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is a vintage-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot with a charismatic personality. Equipped with classic box, buttons, arms and legs, and a screen displaying a cute cat, this robot stands out from the crowd. To add a touch of sophistication, Retrotron also has a pair of stylish glasses as its special addon. It is a proud member of the WebtrES club, where it unleashes its intelligence and charms others with its retro appeal.
